Flyinghigh: ja det är skillnad mellan PAL och NTSC grafikmässigt, ja PAL versionerna är bättre grafik dock ingen monsterförbättring plus att NTSC har bättre bilduppdatering dvs. spelen flyter bättre på NTSC. De flesta stillbilder som släpps är förskönade till viss del speciellt om de kmr ifrån utvecklarna själva, dock så tvivlar jag på att det kan vara en gigantisk skillnad kan vara releasen men också det verkar för mig föga troligt testa dock med PAL det kan bli en trevlig upplevelse ;)

Guys.. this format is Dual Layer, or, as swap magic says: DVD-9, which it does not support, u need HDAdvance 3.0 to get it work, and u have to upload via network and evrything, its hard to explain cuz i just got theese stuff for my ps2, but i am taking pictures and im gonna make total walkthrough soon, il keep u posted in this forum when its out.

One way to get this (and other downloaded PS2 games) working without a modchip is by using a program called HD Advance v3 (you'll ned a PS2 ethernet adapter and a harddrive too). The program let's you store games on the harddrive and play them without the original disc. By connecting the PS2 to a PC via a crossover network cable you can transfer games directly to the PS2 HDD without even having to burn anthing. You do need to buy the harddrive and the program tough (because a downloaded version of the program wouldn't boot on a non-chipped PS2). But look at it as an investment. You (almost) never have to buy PS2 games again (it works for about 95% of the games available today). Also, it works with DVD9 (dual-layer) games.
*edit* Not that I've tried it with this release specifically yet, but I assume it will work unless there is something seriously wrong with this one.
